channel.title: I need help. giving somethin away to who ever tels me!
channel.description: how do i put my server on this site? or post my runescape private server so poeple can download it.. im giving admin to who ever tels my how.. :)

item.title: I need help. giving somethin away to who ever tels me!
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

ok, take your client first make sure ur ip is in it prob like server = “yourip” in client.java.
or if you use an ip changing client just give them the link to download that.
example : silabsoft.

then right click on it and add to archieve (winrar).

once its in a winrar file upload it to:

www.uppit.com

MediaFire

MediaFire

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.


www.megaupload.com

then add the server to the status page and give them the link to download it.
The link of where u uploaded it prob like www.uppit.com//long list of numbers and letters

Read full topic
item.source: I need help. giving somethin away to who ever tels me!

item.title: I need help. giving somethin away to who ever tels me!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“RSVault, post:2, topic:394035”]http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php

Click “Register Server”. You have to put all the info there. Also, I don’t want the admin, but REP would be nice.[/quote]

Don’t ask for rep.

Read full topic
